name: Fall Festival Acorns
description: Knit acorns to accompany your knit leaves and pumpkins. Using just one Fall Festival bundle, you can create colorful decor for everyone’s favorite season.
full_text: Knit acorns to accompany your knit leaves and pumpkins. Using just one Fall Festival bundle, you can create colorful decor for everyone’s favorite season. Pattern is written for solid acorn. Add color work as desired using photos as inspiration. one mini hank will make one complete acorn. EXPERIENCE LEVEL Advanced Beginner MATERIALS Woolstok (Worsted) Bundle (100% Fine Highland Wool, 21 mini hanks; 5g/12yds): 1 Bundle (Fall Festival) FINISHED MEASUREMENTS Circumference: 4” after stuffing Height: 3” including stem COLOR SHOWN Mossy Green No. 1326, Earth Ivy No. 1309, Gravel Road No. 1302, Drift Wood No. 1312, Highland Fleece No. 1303, Ember Glow No. 1323, Rusted Roof No. 1311
